languages.text: {n}Эльдар смотрит на вас испытующе.{/n} "Я скорблю по ушедшим. Мое сердце сгорает от боли и ярости от одного лишь взгляда на убийцу моих братьев, мон-кай. Но если ты таким образом пытаешься вывести меня из равновесия, знай — ничего не выйдет. Я не настолько глуп, чтобы бросать тебе вызов. По крайней мере, сейчас. Я все еще нужен тебе, ну а ты... нуж{mf|ен|на} мне".

traits.locale_text: {n}Эльдар смотрит на вас испытующе.{/n} "Я скорблю по ушедшим. Мое сердце сгорает от боли и ярости от одного лишь взгляда на убийцу моих братьев, мон-кай. Но если ты таким образом пытаешься вывести меня из равновесия, знай — ничего не выйдет. Я не настолько глуп, чтобы бросать тебе вызов. По крайней мере, сейчас. Я все еще нужен тебе, ну а ты... нуж{mf|ен|на} мне".
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."
languages.original_text: {n}Эльдар смотрит на вас испытующе.{/n} "Я скорблю по ушедшим. Мое сердце сгорает от боли и ярости от одного лишь взгляда на убийцу моих братьев, мон-кай. Но если ты таким образом пытаешься вывести меня из равновесия, знай — ничего не выйдет. Я не настолько глуп, чтобы бросать тебе вызов. По крайней мере, сейчас. Я все еще нужен тебе, ну а ты... нуж{mf|ен|на} мне".

But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am no so stupid as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}El Aeldari te dirige una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «Lloro por los que ya no están. Mi corazón arde de dolor y furia cuando os veo a ti y a los de tu ralea, mon-keigh. Pero si haces esto para obligarme a perder la compostura, ten por seguro que fracasarás. No cometeré la insensatez de desafiarte. Al menos, no en este momento. Tú aún me necesitas, y yo... aún te necesito a ti».
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}El Aeldari te dirige una mirada inquisitiva.{/n} «Lloro por los que ya no están. Mi corazón arde de dolor y furia cuando os veo a ti y a los de tu ralea, mon-keigh. Pero si haces esto para obligarme a perder la compostura, ten por seguro que fracasarás. No cometeré la insensatez de desafiarte. Al menos, no en este momento. Tú aún me necesitas, y yo... aún te necesito a ti».
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}アエルダリがあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n} 「私は、もうこの世にいない者たちを悼む。我が血族の殺戮者の姿を見るだけで、この心は痛みと怒りで燃え上がるぞ、モン＝ケイよ。だが私が冷静さを失うように仕向けているのであれば、それはお前の失策だ。私はお前に挑むほど愚かではない。少なくとも今はな。お前はまだ私を必要としているし、私にとっても…お前はまだ必要だ」
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}アエルダリがあなたをじっと見つめる。{/n} 「私は、もうこの世にいない者たちを悼む。我が血族の殺戮者の姿を見るだけで、この心は痛みと怒りで燃え上がるぞ、モン＝ケイよ。だが私が冷静さを失うように仕向けているのであれば、それはお前の失策だ。私はお前に挑むほど愚かではない。少なくとも今はな。お前はまだ私を必要としているし、私にとっても…お前はまだ必要だ」
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}艾达灵族试探性地打量着你。{/n}“我为那些离世之人感到悲伤。你杀害了我的族人，一看到你，我的心就会燃起痛苦与愤怒，猴子。不过，如果你这样做只是为了让我失去冷静，那你恐怕要失望了。我还不至于蠢到挑战你，至少现在不行。你还需要我，而我……我也同样需要你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}艾达灵族试探性地打量着你。{/n}“我为那些离世之人感到悲伤。你杀害了我的族人，一看到你，我的心就会燃起痛苦与愤怒，猴子。不过，如果你这样做只是为了让我失去冷静，那你恐怕要失望了。我还不至于蠢到挑战你，至少现在不行。你还需要我，而我……我也同样需要你。”
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}L'Aeldari vous lance un regard pénétrant.{/n} « Je pleure ceux qui ne sont plus. Mon cœur brûle de douleur et de rage à la simple vue du fléau de mon espèce, mon-keigh. Mais si vous faites cela dans l'idée de me faire perdre mon sang-froid, soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que vous n'y parviendrez pas. Je ne suis pas imprudent au point de vous défier. Pas encore, du moins. Vous avez encore besoin de moi, et... j'ai encore besoin de vous. »
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}L'Aeldari vous lance un regard pénétrant.{/n} « Je pleure ceux qui ne sont plus. Mon cœur brûle de douleur et de rage à la simple vue du fléau de mon espèce, mon-keigh. Mais si vous faites cela dans l'idée de me faire perdre mon sang-froid, soyez {mf|assuré|assurée} que vous n'y parviendrez pas. Je ne suis pas imprudent au point de vous défier. Pas encore, du moins. Vous avez encore besoin de moi, et... j'ai encore besoin de vous. »
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Der Aeldari starrt dich forschend an.{/n} "Ich trauere um alle, die nicht mehr sind. Mein Herz brennt vor Schmerz und ich empfinde Wut, wenn ich {mf|den Schlächter|die Schlächterin} meines Volks anblicke, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber wenn Ihr wollt, dass ich die Fassung verliere, dann geht davon aus, dass Euch das nicht gelingen wird. Ich bin nicht so dumm, Euch herauszufordern. Noch nicht, zumindest. Ihr braucht mich noch und ich ... brauche Euch noch."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Aeldari starrt dich forschend an.{/n} "Ich trauere um alle, die nicht mehr sind. Mein Herz brennt vor Schmerz und ich empfinde Wut, wenn ich {mf|den Schlächter|die Schlächterin} meines Volks anblicke, Chem-Pan-Sey. Aber wenn Ihr wollt, dass ich die Fassung verliere, dann geht davon aus, dass Euch das nicht gelingen wird. Ich bin nicht so dumm, Euch herauszufordern. Noch nicht, zumindest. Ihr braucht mich noch und ich ... brauche Euch noch."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer

languages.text: {n}Aeldari, bakışlarıyla seni inceliyor.{/n} "Artık aramızda olmayanların yasını tutuyorum. Soydaşlarımı katletmiş bir mon-keigh gördüğüm anda yüreğim, acı ve öfkeyle yanıyor. Ancak bunu itidalimi kaybetmem için yapıyorsan emin ol başarısız olacaksın. Sana meydan okuyacak kadar ahmak değilim. Şu anda bana ihtiyacın var... Benim de sana."
languages.original_text: {n}The Aeldari gives you a probing stare.{/n} "I grieve for those who are no more. My heart burns with pain and fury at the mere sight of the slayer of my kin, mon-keigh. But if you are doing this to make me lose my composure, rest assured that you will fail. I am not so foolish as to challenge you. Not yet, at any rate. You still need me, and I... still need you."

traits.locale_text: {n}Aeldari, sana inceleyen bir bakış atıyor.{/n} "Artık olmayanların yasını tutuyorum. Soydaşlarımın katili bir mon-keigh görünce bile yüreğim acı ve öfkeyle yanıyor. Ancak bunu itidalimi kaybetmem için yapıyorsan emin ol ki başarısız olacaksın. Sana meydan okuyacak kadar ahmak değilim. Hiç değilse şimdilik bana ihtiyacın var ve... Benim de sana ihtiyacım var."
traits.speaker: PainedFarseer
